caption.title: The spatial distribution of hemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome (HFRS) incidence rates and deaths in Shandong Province 2012â€“2015.
caption.p: HFRS incidence rates in 142 counties of Shandong Province were calculated and divided into 6 groups represented by different colors. The plus sign represented the location of deaths. The map was visualized with ArcGIS 10.2 software (ESRI Inc., Redlands, CA, USA).
